title: KnowNative
description: A language learning app focused on enhancing Chinese language skills by improving vocabulary and reading comprehension.
accomplishments: Created React UI components for major features of the app, including sidebars, modal windows, edit forms, and pop-up windows
Introduced React’s Context API and useReducer into the app’s codebase as part of the state management refactoring team
Gained experience contributing to a large, unfamilar codebase

Ensured consistency with business requirements, UX/UI designs, and technical specifications during development through code reviews, paired programming sessions, and effective communication with the app owner and team of 15+

title: WanderWise
description: A travel advisory application where users can search for recommendations for restaurants, hotels, flights, and recreational activities for their upcoming trips.
accomplishments: Integrated the Amadeus API, TripAdvisor API, and Google Places API to deliver personalized travel suggestions for users
Designed responsive interfaces for desktop and mobile devices and oversaw web accessibility efforts for greater user experience

Implemented Next.js for full-stack development under a 2-week deadline, working with both AWS Amplify and Vercel for deployment, gaining experience with cloud-based environments, build pipelines, CI/CD, and troubleshooting deployment issues
